title: Oku Trade
shortDescription: Trade tokens on Uniswap V3 with advanced analytics
description: Oku Trade is a professional DEX interface built on Uniswap V3. Swap tokens, provide liquidity, and access advanced trading analytics on Telos EVM.
author: GFX Labs

title: Telos Bridge
shortDescription: Bridge assets to and from Telos
description: Bridge tokens between Telos and 35+ chains including Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, Arbitrum and more. Powered by Superbridge with support for TLOS, USDC, USDT, WBTC, and ETH.
author: Telos Foundation

title: Meridian Mint
shortDescription: Mint USDM stablecoin using TLOS collateral
description: Meridian Mint allows users to deposit TLOS as collateral and mint USDM, a decentralized stablecoin on Telos EVM. Manage your debt positions with competitive collateral ratios.
author: Meridian Finance

title: Meridian Lend
shortDescription: Lend and borrow assets on Telos
description: Meridian Lend is a decentralized lending and borrowing protocol on Telos EVM. Supply assets to earn yield or borrow against your collateral with competitive rates.
author: Meridian Finance

title: Telos Wallet
description: The official Telos Wallet for managing TLOS and EVM tokens. Send, receive, stake TLOS, vote for block producers, and interact with Telos native and EVM networks.
author: Telos Foundation

title: Rarible
description: Rarible is a community-owned NFT marketplace. Create, buy, and sell digital collectibles on Telos EVM with low gas fees.
author: Rarible

title: HoudiniSwap
description: HoudiniSwap enables private, cross-chain token swaps. Swap between TLOS and 100+ tokens across multiple chains with built-in privacy features.
author: HoudiniSwap

title: RocketX
description: RocketX is a cross-chain swap aggregator that finds the best rates across DEXs and bridges. Swap between Telos and 100+ chains with optimal routing.
author: RocketX
